name: Commencement of business
description: Invested shareholders must confirm payment and office address

name: Auditor Appointment
description: Company informs new auditor and submits ADT form to ROC

name: DIN eKYC
description: Directors share personal information for identification & verification

name: DPT-3
description: Companies report money taken form people to ROC; auditors confirm  details.

name: MCA Form AOC-4
description: It's like an  official report card for a company's documents.

name: MCA Form MGT-7
description: Companies must annually report activities and finances to the registrar
